lead_paragraph: In 1630 New England, decades before the Salem witch trials, William and Katherine lead a devout Christian life, homesteading on the edge of an impassible wilderness with five children, including their teen daughter Thomasin. When their newborn son mysteriously vanishes and their crops fail, the family begins to turn on one another.
